price: 43. Boye bapengwi na bino bazali malamu koleka ba oyo kuna? То ezali na eloko ya kobatela bino okati ya makomi?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
